alert.note: Alert for Logan; Scott; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 8:53AM CDT until April 05 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Logan County in western Arkansas... East central Scott County in western Arkansas... Northwestern Yell County in central Arkansas... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 853 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Stonehouse Recreation Area, or 14 miles southeast of Booneville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Danville... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Mount Magazine... Belleville... Havana... Corinth... Ranger... Macedonia in Yell County... Waveland... Waltreak... Kingston... Blue Ball... Spring Lake Campground... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
